Comments_List: The class was a very good survey on political economy across the three thinkers it focused on. It was a solid introduction for someone who had never studied two of the three thinkers in great detail before.
Someone that was lacking was a cohesive engagement with the themes of democracy and inequality as featured in the title.
Yes, for undergraduates with experience in political theory and especially in the themes of political economy.
